description: Knives are coming out for former Rep. author: Scott Peyton, opinion contributor
description: The Second Chance Reauthorization Act of 2025 offers a path forward for people leaving prison by removing barriers to reintegration and providing targeted reentry support, which promotes safety and reduces the burden on law enforcement.
title: The Second Chance Reauthorization Act will make America safer

title: Graham says ‘long way to go’ before lasting peace in Middle East

description: President Trump announced on Sunday that Dan Scavino, his deputy chief of staff, will head the White House Presidential Personnel Office. title: Trump picks longtime aide Dan Scavino to head White House personnel office

description: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich (R-Ga.) praised President Trump for being "willing to take the heat" after thousands of furloughed federal employees were laid off during the government shutdown. title: Newt Gingrich on Trump’s shutdown layoffs: ‘He’s willing to take the heat’

author: Lexi Lonas Cochran
description: Where the federal government is pulling back, churches are looking to step up.   Amid the Trump administration's funding cuts and the ongoing government shutdown, houses of worship have felt a responsibility to step up services for students, immigrants and others who are struggling. From increases in anti-hunger initiatives to programs for federal workers who...
title: Churches look to step up as government services dwindle under Trump

description: House GOP leaders are facing increasing pressure to bring the chamber back to Washington amid a shutdown fight with no end in sight. title: Pressure growing on Johnson to call House back amid shutdown fight

description: The Rafah crossing will reopen to allow passage between Gaza and Egypt following Israel and Hamas's agreement to a peace deal and the first phase of a ceasefire. A European Union Border Assistance Missions (EUBAM) monitoring mission will resume its duties, according to a statement from Italian Defense Minister Guido Crosetto on Friday. title: Rafah crossing to reopen as Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal takes effect

title: Mamdani says political retribution ‘only thing’ Trump can deliver on
